title: 有冇咩Marketing公司好做/做過係伏

replies.msg:
可以分享下嘛
好/伏都可以講
Axtactics 大伏！D人事全部閪到爆，千其咪入

My friend Fuyuki Tomio has opened a gym. So far it's been a great success. The outstanding quality gym and shower equipment is a decisive factor in the success of his gym. Of course customer service also plays a major role in the company's success. He asked if I could find a Marketing Manager for him. I said "I can't make any promises but I'll see what I can do." My friend Sumio has an interview gor a Marketing Executive position in his company tomorrow. Fuyuki laid heavy stress on the need for leadership qualities. ge also stressed that clear communication skill is a key factor in the outcome of the interview. The interview stresses him out. I said "dont stress too much about it." My girlfriend too said "try not to stress too much over it. Set your mind at rest." My brother said as well "Rest easy. put your mind at ease." Last week we had lunch at Sumio's place. His younger brother got Japanese homework to do. He said "I have to do part A but haven't got to do part B" I said "I'll leave you doing your homework." He soaks up new vocabularies and grammar patterns very quickly. During a japanese class he soaks up everything the teacher says. When "Fukushima" is a japanese word the stress is on the second third and last syllables. But when it's an english word you should stress the third syllable only. When he reads a novel he's like a sponge and soak up the story. If he encounters computer problems he'll find jess who's an expert and soak up the advice she offers. His elder brother has a viola exam next week. After chatting with him for a while I said "I'd better leave you to get on with your practice." My girlfriend said "I had better leave you to practise your exam pieces." Some milk spilt down the chair onto the floor so Sumio soaked it up with a dishcloth. After lunch his elder sister went to meditate in her room so I left her to herself. His younger sis booked a massage session. She asked "had I better leave my wallet on the nightstand?" I said "you had better not leave it on the night table during your massage session as someone might steal it" My brother said "hadnt you better leave it in your locker so that its safe?" I can swim after a fashion. Sumio who's a swimming champion easily outshines me in any swimming styles.
